ISSUE.TITLE: Order / Customer list optimizations
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Since order / customer queries are ordered by CreatedOnUtc descending by default, I propose adding the following indexes out-of-the-box: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX IX_CREATEDONUTC ON dbo.[Order] (CreatedOnUtc DESC) CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX IX_CREATEDONUTC ON dbo.[Customer] (CreatedOnUtc DESC) Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/48393/order-customer-list-optimizations.aspx
